docs.title: IMAP
docs.text: This will guide you on registering your IMAP-based email address with an email application

docs.title: What You Need
docs.text: Before connecting your email account to your email application, you will need the following: 1. Your full email address for your email account 2. The password for the email account 3. The application you have decided to use 4. The connection settings which are: - the SMTP server and port, - the IMAP server and port, and, - the authentication type.
